title: Taiyou no Yuusha Fighbird (Brave of the Sun Fighbird)
synopsis: An evil alien life form, Dryus, assaulted the Earth. The leader of Space Patrol, Fighbird, pursed Dryus to the Earth. Fighbird combined with an android that Dr. Amano was developing. Fighbird named Hidori Ryutaro and fight against Dryus to protect the peace of the Earth.
related_anime: ['Yuusha Tokkyuu Might Gaine', 'Ougon Yuusha Goldran', 'Densetsu no Yuusha Da Garn', 'Yuusha-Ou GaoGaiGar', 'Yuusha Exkaiser', 'Yuusha Keisatsu J-Decker', 'Yuusha Shirei Dagwon']
characters: ['Katori, Yuutarou', 'Amano, Haruka', 'Guard Star', 'Amano, Kenta', 'Amano, Hiroshi', 'Yamazaki, Momoko ']
staff: [['Yatabe, Katsuyoshi', ['Director']], ['Chiba, Kouichi', ['Sound Director']], ['Takamatsu, Shinji', ['Episode Director']], ['Ishiodori, Hiroshi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
